name: HAMMO
description:
Health is ammunition. Rocketjump and Bunnyhop to go fast.

Tips:   

  • Put on your favorite soundtrack. Or mine.
  • Hold jump in the air to buffer a bunnyhop on landing, retaining your horizontal momentum.
  • Remember to use both weapons!
  • HUD shows remaining HAMMO on the left of the crosshair, and current speed on the right. Remaining/Total enemies is shown at the top right of the HUD.
  • while flying through the air, air strafe by looking forward, releasing W, holding A or D, and slowly turning in the corresponding direction. This can be done backwards and sideways with practice.
  • Level 3 is hard. if you cant complete it, try to lower your time on level 2 first.

Controls:

  • Mouse to look
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse1 to fire
  • Scroll wheel to switch weapons
  • R to reset level

Please report your best times in the comments!
